start.name: Pepi:
start.content: I've something I wanna discuss with you, Navigator.

start.name: Navigator:
start.content: Hmm? Sure, what's on your mind?

start.name: Pepi:
start.content: Those Fireflies... Can I take one?

start.name: Pepi:
start.content: That way, I could have my very own Speaker!

start.name: Navigator:
start.content: But... The Fireflies can only live aboard a Colossus.
